button.label: Refresh
button.supertip: Refreshes the list of available FusionLink instances

dynamicMenu.label: Change connection
dynamicMenu.supertip: Displays a list of available FusionLink instances that can be connected to.

button.label: Load Porfolios
button.supertip: Causes FusionLink to perform an F8 on the portfolios subscribed to via the GETPORTFOLIOVALUE function. See the Wiki for more information.

button.label: Calculate
button.supertip: Causes FusionLink to perform an F9 on the portfolios subscribed to via the GETPORTFOLIOVALUE and GETPOSITIONVALUE functions. Note: This will not trigger a calcution in this workbook when in manual calc mode. See the Wiki for more information.
